Reviews.Title: Outstanding customer service
Reviews.Author: JoJo
Reviews.Content: When I received the phone, I found that it did not function properly due to an issue with the screen. Upon contacting the seller, they promptly sent a replacement phone. The replacement seems to be in good condition and functioning properly. I would recommend this seller and I would purchase from them again. Outstanding customer service.

ProductInfo.Features:
No contract Sprint cell phone ready to activate on Sprint wireless
Excellent Conditioned Pre-Owned Phone, You Will Be Very Satisfied
Used no contract Sprint Cell Phone
Full 30 day customer satisfaction warranty
Please contact us with any questions and we will reply ASAP
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo MM-7400 Gray Sprint Cell Phone
